name: Owl Knight (Althior)
description:
Owl Knight is a game created for Ludum dare 50, in 72h. 

"Since the beginning of time, the owl kingdom has always repelled the creatures of the night with light. But over time, the forces of the night grew in strength and eventually overcame those of the Owl Kingdom. There is only one hope left today to only delay the inevitable..." 

Owl Knight is a platform game where you play the role of a little owl who is the last bastion between the owl kingdom and the forces of the night. In this game, you will have to free the families of owls through a procedurally generated level, while delaying the forces of darkness.
